endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint for OPC API operations.

identity_domain.description: The OPC identity domain for API operations

insecure.description: Skip TLS Verification for self-signed certificates. Should only be used if absolutely required.

lbaas_endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint for the Load Balancer Classic service.

max_retries.description: Maximum number retries to wait for a successful response when operating on resources within OPC (defaults to 1)

password.description: The user password for OPC API operations.

storage_endpoint.description: The HTTP endpoint for Oracle Storage operations.

user.description: The user name for OPC API operations.

accept_ranges.description: Type of ranges that the object accepts

content.description: Raw content in string-form of the data

content_disposition.description: Overrides the behavior of the browser

content_length.description: Length of the object in bytes

content_type.description: Set the MIME type for the object

delete_at.description: The date and time in UNIX Epoch time stamp format when the system removes the object

etag.description: MD5 checksum value of the request body. Unquoted. Strongly Recommended

file.description: File path for the content to use for data

last_modified.description: Date and Time that the object was created/modified in ISO 8601

timestamp.description: Date and Time in UNIX EPOCH when the account, container, or object was initially created at the current version

transaction_id.description: Transaction ID of the request. Used for bug reports

transfer_encoding.description: Sets the transfer encoding. Can only be 'chunked' or Nil, requires Content-Length to be 0 if set
